<Heading
  as={"h1"}
  className={"openapi__heading"}
  children={"Create Content"}
>
</Heading>

<MethodEndpoint
  method={"post"}
  path={"/api/content/create"}
  context={"endpoint"}
>
  
</MethodEndpoint>



Create content through the content team graph.

Supports:
- text: Generate text content via Kimi K2.5 PARL
- visual: Generate images via FLUX.2 Pro
- combined: Both in parallel

May pause at HITL review - returns thread_id for resume.
Stores generation in vector DB for self-learning.
